articles.title: Horse pulling Princess Beatrice’s carriage loses control after being spooked at Royal Ascot... - The Sun
articles.content:
A HORSE pulling Princes Beatrice scarily lost control when it became spooked at Royal Ascot yesterday.
The animal bucked wildly with Beatrice sat next husband Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi in the carriage.… [+2057 chars]
